css: table, th, td {  } table.center {   margin-left: auto;   margin-right: auto; } table {border: none;} .grid-item {     padding: 20px; } .grid-container {   display: grid;   grid-row-gap: 50px;     grid-template-areas: 'left left main main right right'; } h3 {   text-align: right; } .item1 { grid-area: right; } .item2 { grid-area: left; }

html:
Quotation


PT Bersaudara Inti Corpora

Gedung Intercon Plaza Lt. 2 Blok F No. 15
RT.001 RW.009 Srengseng Kembangan
Jakarta Barat DKI Jakarta 11630

Quote To

{{ doc.customer_name }}
{{ doc.contact_display }}
Phone: {{ doc.contact_mobile }}
{{ doc.address_display }}
Quotation Number {{ doc.name }}
Quotation Date {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.transaction_date,"dd-mm-yyyy")}}
Valid Till {{frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.valid_till,"dd-mm-yyyy")}}
Delivery On {{ doc.delivery_on }}
Payment Term {{ doc.payment_terms_template }}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
Product Item Class Item Sub Class Price UOM Tax
{{ row.item_name }} {{ row.item_class}}
{{ row.item_sub_class }}
 {{row.get_formatted("rate", doc) }} {{ row.stock_uom }} {{ row.item_tax_template }}
Terms and Condition:

{{ doc.terms }}

Quotation Prepared by:

{{ doc.employee_name }}

{{ doc.emp_email_1 }}



This Document has been generated by system
name: Quotation style
